main event: Three objects were observed in Brookfield, Massachusetts on September 4, 1964, reportedly resembling a bright star/planet in motion.
interesting points: The objects hovered above the lake and performed erratic maneuvers., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The witness described the object as very bright, about the size of a dime held at arm's length., The object changed colors from bright white to reddish-orange., The observation occurred around 8:40 P.M. and lasted for two hours in total.
sighted object: three bright objects in the sky
witness description: The witness reported seeing a brilliantly illuminated object that was silent and changed colors.
